title: Match winning plays of the 2015 LCS Summer Split Semifinals

replies.body: I like to think WildTurtle shouted "REVENGE!" when he stole baron with the Jinx rocket.
best part of this article is QT face in crowd XD
lol it took me a minute to find it
WildTurtle is allowed to _steal_ baron but graves can't have a cigar? {{champion:104}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Graves quit smoking... Stop complaining about his life choices.
It was a nice TP play... I think the scrying orb into timed jinx rocket was better though. Less team, more luck, but still, lol.
the biggest play of the semifinals belongs to the "project".
Bjerg with the slide, the glide, the Emperor's Divide!
